divs: sighting detailsi was walking my dog. i have a habit of watching local aircraft traffic in the area as they approach the hillsboro and portland airport. i heard what sounded like a high performance aircraft and looked skyward and spotted a jet headed west at a very high altitude. it was barely visible. then a shiny brilliant spot caught my eye about 15 degrees north of the aircraft. i thought it was another aircraft until i watched it for a few seconds. it was moving very fast and making abrupt almost erratic changes in direction. it took only a matter of seconds before it was totally out of sight. from where i was standing it flew in a west \ north west direction. if i had to guess i'd say it was 30000 feet or higher because it appeared to be higher than a vapor trail from another aircraft.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hillsboro
There were no other sightings in Hillsboro on or around September 24th 2007
Summary: High altitude shiny sphere moving very fast and erratic headed north west
